 Corporate Bookings


Our beer & cider festival is an ideal opportunity for a friendly relaxed atmosphere for client or colleague entertaining. Don't wait till Christmas to book that office party! Come and enjoy the sunshine, live music and a sociable drink. Corporate hospitality packages and tutored beer and cider tasting sessions are available Tuesday to Friday.

What we offer


350 real ales, 100 ciders & perries, 100 foreign beers. Including cask lagers, wines and pilsners.

A 10 minute walk from the city's bus and rail stations.



One of the highlights of Chelmsford City's social calendar

An impressive variety of world food and snacks. Including, fish & chips, curries, burgers, chilli's, jacket potatoes, pizza's, noodles.



A 2 acre site with marquee space for over 3000 people and a beer garden for 4000.

All corporate customers do not have to queue on entrance.





Our Packages

We can tailor any package to your requirements. Packages can include, admission, souvenir glass, tutored tasting drinks and food tokens, please ask and we can provide a quotation.

  Contact Us


Package A

£15 / per person

  1. Includes admission
  2. Souvenir glass
  3. 4 half pints of real ale or cider

Package B

£25 / per person

  1. Includes admission
  2. Souvenir glass
  3. 4 half pints of real ale or cider
  4. A basket type meal

Package C

£30 / per person

  1. Includes admission
  2. Souvenir glass
  3. 8 half pints of real ale or cider
  4. A basket type meal

Package D

£10 / per person

  1. Tutored beer or cider tasting*

Package E

£25 / per person

  1. Additional 10 half pint vouchers for Real Ale or Real Cider. (Sold as a lot of 10 tokens)

Package F

£50 / per group

  1. Reserved table and seating located in the beer garden.


Interested? Ask for more information and book tickets   Contact Us


Additional details

Prices exclude VAT, a VAT invoice or receipt will be issued.

Corporate customers can purchase additional beer, cider and food tokens on the day.

CAMRA do not accept American Express.

*Tutor tasting will be located in a quiet designated area. Sessions will be lead, when available, by a local brewer or senior member of Chelmsford CAMRA who will share their passion for real ale or cider and demonstrate the wide variety of flavours available. A specific time will need to be arranged for these sessions.
